thread.title: YouZign releases Online Graphic Design Tool with Warrior Forum
thread.title_full: YouZign releases Online Graphic Design Tool with Warrior Forum

author: prbuzz.com
title: YouZign releases Online Graphic Design Tool with Warrior Forum
text:
YouZign, an online graphic design tool to rival Canva is releasing a discounted version of its SAAS with the Warrior Forum. In partnership with Warrior Forum , Bertrand Osso of YouZign is offering the online graphic design tool at a 81% discount for YouZign’s lifetime license. The online graphic design tool is currently priced at $37 while the regular pricing (which will commence on September 21) is published as $197 on their website. The only caveat to YouZign’s and WarriorForum’s partnership offer is that members must access and purchase YouZign through the Warrior Forum which may be accessed here: YouZign Warrior Forum
Bertrand Diouly Osso hails from New Zealand and is the co-founder of YouZign along with Magnus Ilechukwu. Bertrand provided YouZign is an alternative online graphic design tool set to fulfill majority of the basic graphic design necessities that can be done without Photoshop. The objective was a simple and easy to use tool hence user interface was something that Magnus and Bertrand emphasized on improving. The end result is a user-friendly and easy to use online graphic design tool that provides accessibility to webmasters, internet marketers , and SME owners the ability to create professional looking design without the expensive costs.
This is accomplished through its WYSIWYG platform coupled with professionally created templates for a variety of necessary designs from flyers to business cards and social media banners. YouZign can be used by internet marketers to create attractive ad banners with call to action signs and webmasters for website graphics. It also provides the ability to create business cards, seals, flyers, and even videos. YouZign users will select a template, edit the text, add their own graphics and effects then render the end product into a .png file for online or offline usage.
The unique feature with YouZign is also the ability to create unlimited graphics with full rights to the inclusive graphics for a monthly, yearly, or one-time fee. This provides an economical substitute to photoshop for those who require less intensive designs. Webmasters and SME owners have noted their appreciation to take graphic design into their own hands. Many of these, do not like waiting for sub-par designs and folk out expensive fees for simple designs to freelance graphic designers. Thankfully, YouZign identified this fault and released their online graphic design tool back in 2013.
YouZign now has more than 12,000 members who use its online graphic design tool and online banner maker. The YouZign team have expressed their surprise to the large following the tool has taken online. Primarily, the online graphic design tool works as a SAAS (service as a software) removing the need for complex and time-consuming installations for its members. This is one of the appealing benefits which Youzign provides as a Photoshop alternative. The online graphic design tool is not without competitors however. Canva, another online graphic design tool and online banner maker is also highly popularized but they host a higher entrance fee with more features included. Users of YouZign can expect consistent updates and continued value for the online graphic design tool.
People who are interested in using Youzign are encouraged to take advantage of the special YouZign and Warrior Forum discount. The offer may be accessed through the following YouZign review on the Warrior Forum.
About YouZign:
YouZign is a leading online graphic design tool that provides a photoshop alternative to its members. The key value proposition is the ability to create professional and attractive designs in minutes. YouZign is also provides business owners and webmasters with control over their graphic design needs, removing the need to communicate with graphic designers. It also features a plug and pay usage which does not require it’s user to install any programs serving as an online graphic design tool. YouZign is an online graphic design tool and online banner maker created by Bertrand and Magnus initially launched on the Warrior Forum.
